toString(uint256).code: function toString(uint256 value) internal pure returns (string)
toString(uint256).details: Converts a `uint256` to its ASCII `string` decimal representation.

toString(int256).code: function toString(int256 value) internal pure returns (string)
toString(int256).details: Converts a `int256` to its ASCII `string` decimal representation.

toHexString(uint256).code: function toHexString(uint256 value) internal pure returns (string)
toHexString(uint256).details: Converts a `uint256` to its ASCII `string` hexadecimal representation.

toHexString(uint256,uint256).code: function toHexString(uint256 value, uint256 length) internal pure returns (string)
toHexString(uint256,uint256).details: Converts a `uint256` to its ASCII `string` hexadecimal representation with fixed length.

toHexString(address).code: function toHexString(address addr) internal pure returns (string)
toHexString(address).details: Converts an `address` with fixed length of 20 bytes to its not checksummed ASCII `string` hexadecimal representation.

equal(string,string).code: function equal(string a, string b) internal pure returns (bool)
equal(string,string).details: Returns true if the two strings are equal.
